code: import React from'react';import{Card,Button}from'react-bootstrap';import{LinkContainer}from'react-router-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DEFAULT_IMAGE='https://via.placeholder.com/300x200?text=Нет+изображения';const ServiceCard=_ref=>{let{id,title,description,imageUrl,price}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"h-100 shadow-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{variant:"top",src:imageUrl||DEFAULT_IMAGE,style:{height:'200px',objectFit:'cover'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{className:"d-flex flex-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Text,{className:"mt-auto fw-bold",children:["\u0426\u0435\u043D\u0430: ",price," \u0440\u0443\u0431."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LinkContainer,{to:"/service/".concat(id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",children:"\u041F\u043E\u0434\u0440\u043E\u0431\u043D\u0435\u0435"})})]})]});};export default ServiceCard;
